attributes.action: ban horses and riders from the public highway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
horses are unpredictable and dangerous.  even if a rider thinks they have control, when a half a ton of horse decides it is doing something the rider has little option but to concur.  in the vicinity of cars and cyclists this presents an unacceptable risk to human life.

they also leave their faeces on the road which makes the road slippery and therefore dangerous.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
